text: 48:35 Jeremaia 3:17; 33:16; Joel 3:21; Sekaraia 2:10; Akar Mogomem 21:3; 22:3Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nguibar ekiam avɨnizir dɨvazimɨn 4plan mɨriaba, dar ababanim bar moghɨra 9,000 mitan tugham. Eghtɨ dughiar kamɨn ikegh mangɨ zurazurara ikiamin dughiamɨn, me nguibar ekiar kamɨn ziam dɨpon suam, ‘Ikiavɨra Itir God Kagh Iti.’ ”
